post.body: And? Did you get free money????
Thanks, the hard part is waiting until tomorrow to pick her up! Though I have to admit cleaning is much easier without a puppy.
no chance do black eyed peas sub for refried beans. Not even in the same taste group. Unless Fergie is involved?
And btw, I'd rather lose by two touchdowns to USC than to Utah... How come USC received more accolades last night than Utah did tonight?
So my question is... Is Alabama a fraud, or is Utah really that good? Either way, my hats off to the Utes. I certainly underestimated you.
Tried to buy Capitals tickets for tomorrow night vs. Rangers... no $40 seats available. Shocking. Now have to shell out min. of $55. Sucks.
Good news and bad news... Good news: Match's procedure was successful/Bad news, now I have to clean the house for company.
Match's pre-surgery picture. http://twitpic.com/yxow
On my way to the vet to get Match spayed. It's a very sad morning. Though it will be the first night L and I have been alone in a few months
Really? An advertisement for the Masters in January? Miss Tiger much last season ad execs?
Trying not to throw my drink at the tv. If brent mustberger doesn't stop loving on USC... - http://bkite.com/03oGB
Hanging with some friends trying to will Penn State along... So far, no luck... - Photo: http://bkite.com/03oDk
Hanging with some friends trying to will Penn State al - Photo: http://bkite.com/03oDi
Grabbing lunch after a very trying experience at walmart. - http://bkite.com/03obP
Fabric shopping with the wife for the nursery. Fun times. - http://bkite.com/03o8c
Gotta give the College Gameday guys some credit for starting a live show on the west coast at 6am Pacific at the Rose Bowl.
Nothing like ringing in the new year with a two minute ad for the new bachelor.
Happy new year tweeple!!n
Just saw slumdog millionaire. Amazing movie. Please to see it.
With Oregon State struggling to score 3 points, I'm extremely thankful Penn State is playing USC tomorrow - regardless of the outcome.
